website_summaries.verdict: Three BPA-free mats that are color-coded for your convenience.
pros: The mats can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleaning
You can hang them when not in use to save space
cons: They aren't as durable as wood, but they're not expensive to replace

customer_reviews.title: Knives leaves slash marks
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used them, cutting vegetables with a sharp knife there were several slash marks left on the cutting mat. I have used Ikea's mats similar to these & they have lasted for a few years. I just assumed these would last as long, but I was disappointed with all the marks left on the mats after first use. Maybe my knives are too sharp?
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are stackable because they keep my counter looking less cluttered. I’ve had these for over three years and I use them multiple times a day. They finally needed to be replaced and I got the bigger size. Love them! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amy bolton

customer_reviews.title: For the money a great choice
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other mats over the years and these are holding up well and are very easy to use. I like the lightness and the size which is perfect for a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: They are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Place them on any surface and they slide when you are cutting. I really don't know how anyone that reviewed these actually used them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wandel

customer_reviews.title: Makes it all so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! So easy and handy to use. Not sure why I ever used heavy cutting boards before. Sheets like this is the way to go! Just bought my parents a set as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Kinda ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too firm. It's ok to slice an apple, but not for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money -
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to wash up. Easy to use - saves my counter top while assembling salads and sandwiches. I wouldn't suggest using these for carving a steak or a roast.
customer_reviews.author: Paschein

customer_reviews.title: Deep gashes on the first use
customer_reviews.text: I guess my knives are too sharp, because these things are slashing so quickly that it's like they're not for cutting at all. I'm keeping the least damaged ones as prep mats, and they'll be fine for that, but using them to actually cut things on is not gonna work for me.
customer_reviews.author: ChiGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: They came with black marks all over the blue one and this item is not returnable so think twice before you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal T Tse

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a good gift for friends of mine at Church. I like good cutting boards and can recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Moore

customer_reviews.title: easy to arrange.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I don't understand why the others complain about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Girardot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set that fits easily in my dish washer and hasnt warped during washes. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: MITCH T

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and are easy to clean and store, but my kitchen knives slice right into them. These are the softest cutting boards I have ever owned. Very disappointing because the way they lock together to store is great. At this rate they will be trash after 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Slippery Suckers
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a quick way to establish which cutting board to use for raw meat and visually the red mat does just that. The issue with all these boards is that they get very slippery very quickly. Any type of moisture what so ever has these boards surfing all over a granite countertop, which in turn can be very dangerous when you are chopping or dicing with a sharp knife. Wish they had a little bit of grip on the underside to prevent this issue. I probably would not recommend these boards or buy them again because of the slip and slide affect.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: East to clean and easy to store on the long edge upright in cabinet. The three colors make it easy to keep mats separate for meats, vegetables, and whatever. I haven't experienced the cutting/marring reported by other users. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Anisoptera

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic chopping mats.
customer_reviews.text: These mats are a little bit smaller than I anticipated, but otherwise they get the job done. They are not fancy, and they don't have enough weight to keep from sliding on the counter, but if you are looking for some basic chopping mats these are wonderful. I love how they lock together for easy storage and that they are dishwasher safe. I will note they have warped just a bit from the dishwasher, but it has not yet affected their ability to snap together. All in all I think these are a wonderful value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: always handy
customer_reviews.text: I prefer using them always . no matter what i am cutting. I love to take them to go with me when i go camping or to the lake.
customer_reviews.author: I.M

customer_reviews.title: Smaller dimensions than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ended up being smaller than expected. Make sure you check the product dimensions before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: lazeekat

customer_reviews.title: love it! so versatile
customer_reviews.text: I make candy crafts, cake flowers and other cake decorations and cake pops and these mats are so helpful. Fits in the fridge when cooling, wraps perfectly using cling wraps, easily cleans and kept neat and snaps together in place... I found one from a specialty store. And glad it's available here at Amazon for a better price and got another one.
customer_reviews.author: pharmie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice plain design that interlock together. These dont take up much space and are very functional. So far, they havent stained from the color of some foods. I love this vendor and purchase alot of JosephJoseph items due to their unique design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed.
customer_reviews.text: These boards do serve their purpose, but the quality is below par. They are very thin, slip all over the counter when in use, and are NOT scratch resistant (which kinda sucks when they're going to have knives on them with every use). The fact that they clip together makes them easy to store, but that is not the main reason for their use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these ..... and finally a board that doesn't take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small and they bend with hot water, hand-washing. Don't put them in your dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: "shaydes_321"

customer_reviews.title: I'M A FAN!
customer_reviews.text: Mats are great. Flexible, wipes clean, and protects the counter. Love all Joseph Joseph products! They're colorful, sturdy, well-designed, and reasonably priced. Adds a little bit of art to my little kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: pretty set
customer_reviews.text: They are very good and do their job. I wash them by hand and there is no change in their shapes. I love this brand, I have bought 4 of their product and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Will scratch easily. Try not to assert too much force when ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is ok. Will scratch easily. Try not to assert too much force when cutting.
customer_reviews.author: P. See

customer_reviews.title: very great
customer_reviews.text: great! bought two for my friend and me! And we both like it !
customer_reviews.author: XIAOLIN FU

customer_reviews.title: I do like them they are sturdy and they held up very ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though I saw the dimensions, it is a lot smaller than I expected. I do like them they are sturdy and they held up very well in he dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzrd

customer_reviews.title: Always a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE anything by Joseph Joseph, because they are easy to use, easy to clean & very easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boards.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand for quality and ease of use. I have many things of this brand and they are my favorite. It’s convenient that you can separately use boards for fish, vegetables and meat without stirring.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Polianskaia

customer_reviews.title: They bow in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: They’re easy to use, yes. Not worth purchasing though. They bow in the middle causing drips off the board onto the counter/floor.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: After using for less than a week, board is already warped and won’t sit flat on counter. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Bespinoza427

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this brand, buy kitchen gizmo instead
customer_reviews.text: After washing in dishwasher, these start to curl and the layers of plastic begin to separate. We are much happier with the kitchen gizmo brand which is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift.......If I had bought them myself I would immediatly return them. The scratched with the first knife use. They are pretty and convenient to store but that is all. I would not recommend these if you plan on cutting anything on them. Unsanitary once they have cut marks.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mary

product_meta.title: Joseph Joseph, Chopping Mats Pop Plus Set Multicolour
product_meta.description: Size:Large 15.5 x 11.5 inchesJoseph Joseph, Chopping Mats Pop Plus Set Multicolour
feature_bullets: Flexible material helps direct chopped food into a pan or food waste into a trash can
Mats clip together for compact storage and can be hung

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
